title: Defence Services Rugby team bags President Rajapaksa trophy
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) Defence Services (DS) rugby team beat the Sri Lanka Rugby Football Union (SLRFU)- President’s XV at the second annual encounter of the Presidential Cup Rugby match at the Army Headquarters grounds on 5th August. President Mahinda Rajapaksa participated the occasion as the Chief Guest. The…
